title.narrative: Uhaki safi : Rapprocher la justice de justiciables à l'Est de la République démocratique du Congo

description.narrative: Contrat subvention attribué à Avocats Sans Frontières pour mettre en oeuvre une partie du résultat 3 du Pogramme Uhaki Safi - PARJE (audience foraine, aide légale, monitoring cas judiciaires...) qui vise à réformer le système judiciaire dans la partie instable de l'Est RDC (suite REJUSCO). Exécuté en collaboration avec RCN (contrat 300-423) et UGP. Suivi par COFED.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC)

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC)

description.narrative: République Démocratique du Congo (RDC), Provinces du Nord Kivu et du Sud Kivu et territoire de l'Ituri.

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
